head.title: Jacqueline C. Horne, Keith A. Smith

hedline.hl1: Jacqueline C. Horne, Keith A. Smith

block.p: Jacqueline C. Horne, a daughter of Rhoda and Kenneth J. Horne of Rutland, Vt., and Keith Arnold Smith, a son of Jane and Floyd L. Smith of New York, are to be married today in a Quaker ceremony at the Lyman Estate in Waltham, Mass.
The couple, both 30, graduated cum laude from Yale University.

Jacqueline C. Horne, a daughter of Rhoda and Kenneth J. Horne of Rutland, Vt., and Keith Arnold Smith, a son of Jane and Floyd L. Smith of New York, are to be married today in a Quaker ceremony at the Lyman Estate in Waltham, Mass.
The couple, both 30, graduated cum laude from Yale University.

Ms. Horne, who is keeping her name, is a children's book editor in Boston for Little, Brown & Company, the publishing concern. Mr. Smith is a doctoral candidate in computer science at Harvard University.
The bride's father is the chief financial officer of the Stratton Mountain Corporation, a resort in Stratton, Vt. Her mother is the accountant at the Rutland Free Library.
The bridegroom's father retired as a vice chairman and the chief investment officer of Mutual of New York, the insurance company. WEDDINGS
